reason.raw: updated the ariac_v2 branch and [things are fine](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/ariac-debbuilder/82/) without this workaround, thanks friends!
reason.html: updated the ariac_v2 branch and things are fine without this workaround, thanks friends!

description.raw:
Without this I ran into the following issue over the weekend https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/ariac-debbuilder/77/console :

```
Step 20/29 : RUN locale-gen en_GB.utf8
 ---> Running in 7d6ec42398ce
/bin/sh: 1: locale-gen: not found
The command '/bin/sh -c locale-gen en_GB.utf8' returned a non-zero code: 127
```

Think the ubuntu base images removed this [nearly a year ago](https://github.com/docker-library/official-images/issues/2856), but I saw there has been some docker cache cleaning work recently that probably caused this to pop up only recently.

As a note, I [originally had](#!/osrf/release-tools/commits/b31dd11077dbc40eae88411b6d993bd8a0f38849) `rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*`, but it caused the following error (https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/ariac-debbuilder/80/consoleFull#-10857956996e2e1b04-6601-495c-8fb8-66d94e1f3e63):

```
  Removing ariac2-build-deps:amd64 because I can't find libgazebo8-dev:amd64
```
